Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:vV4Mem.name: baseView
Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:vV4Mem.abstract: This is the view that contains the UILabel that receives errors.

Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:vV4Mem.name: nextViewController
Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:vV4Mem.abstract: This is the view controller that redirects the login page to the notes feed page.

Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:vV4Mem.name: presentationContext
Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:vV4Mem.abstract: This is the view controller that presents network-related errors.

Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:FV4Mem.name: createLoginOperationChain(username:password:)
Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:FV4Mem.abstract: This method creates login operation chain responsible for the business logic of the Login module. It creates a chain of PNNetworkAvailabilityOperation and PNInvalidLoginErrorObserver.

Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:FV4Mem.name: handleLogin(username:password:)
Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html#/s:FV4Mem.abstract: This method handles the actual login business logic. It queues the chain of operation returned by createLoginOperationChain.

Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.name: baseView
Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.abstract: This is the view that contains the UILabel receiver of errors.

Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.name: nextViewController
Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.abstract: This is the controller that pushes the notes feed.

Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.name: presentationContext
Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.abstract: This is the view controller that receives network-related errors.

Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.name: createRegistrationOperationsChain(username:password:)
Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.abstract: This method creares the operation chain for the registration module. It initializes the a PNNetworkAvailabilityOperation and a PNLoginUserOperation.

Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.name: handleRegistration(username:password:)
Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html#/s.abstract: This is the event handler for Registration logic.

Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html.name: PNRegistrationInteractor
Structs/PNRegistrationInteractor.html.abstract: This struct handles the business logic of the Registration module.

Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html.name: PNLoginInteractor
Structs/PNLoginInteractor.html.abstract: This struct contains the business logic of the Login module.

Protocols/PNLoginViewEventHandler.html.name: PNLoginViewEventHandler
Protocols/PNLoginViewEventHandler.html.abstract: This is a protocol that handles event for the Login module.

Protocols/PNRegistrationViewDelegate.htm.name: PNRegistrationViewDelegate
Protocols/PNRegistrationViewDelegate.htm.abstract: This is a delegate protocol for actions performed on PNRegistrationView.

Protocols/PNRegistrationViewProtocol.htm.name: PNRegistrationViewProtocol
Protocols/PNRegistrationViewProtocol.htm.abstract: This is a protocol for the emailErrorLabel and passwordErrorLabel elements.

Protocols/PNLoginViewDelegate.html.name: PNLoginViewDelegate
Protocols/PNLoginViewDelegate.html.abstract: This class is a delegate of the actions performed on PNLoginView.

Protocols/PNLoginViewProtocol.html.name: PNLoginViewProtocol
Protocols/PNLoginViewProtocol.html.abstract: This class is a protocol of the PNLoginView‘s emailErrorLabel and passwordErrorLabel.

Protocols/PNRegistrationEventHandler.htm.name: PNRegistrationEventHandler
Protocols/PNRegistrationEventHandler.htm.abstract: This protocol contains event handler’s for the Registratiosn module.

Protocols/PNShowNotesFeedProtocol.html.name: PNShowNotesFeedProtocol
Protocols/PNShowNotesFeedProtocol.html.abstract: This is a protocol for showing notes feed screen or the default launch page.

Extensions/PSOperation.html#/s:FE4MemoC1.name: start()
Extensions/PSOperation.html#/s:FE4MemoC1.abstract: This is an important extension method to PSOperation. This cancels the current operation if at least one of its dependencies was cancelled.

Classes/PNNetworkAvailabilityOperation.h.name: execute()
Classes/PNNetworkAvailabilityOperation.h.abstract: This is the execution of the business logic of the operation. If the device is connected to a network. If the device is connected, the operation finishes with no error. Else, if the finishes the operation with a no network error.

Classes/PNLogoutUserOperation.html#/s:FC.name: init(dismissingContext:)
Classes/PNLogoutUserOperation.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method is for the initialization of the class PNLogoutUserOperation.

Classes/PNLogoutUserOperation.html#/s:FC.name: execute()
Classes/PNLogoutUserOperation.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method logs out the current SyncUser and dimisses the dismissingContext, if any.

Classes/PNLoginUserOperation.html#/s:FC4.name: execute()
Classes/PNLoginUserOperation.html#/s:FC4.abstract: This is where the operation execution happens. The user is either logged in or registered depending on the value of isRegister. If successful, this calls the showNotesFeed method of the nextViewController and also finishes the operation. Otherwise, the operation is finished with an error.

Classes/PNLoginView.html#/s:FC4Memo11PNL.name: loginButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/PNLoginView.html#/s:FC4Memo11PNL.abstract: This method is the action receiver of the touch inside the log in button.

Classes/PNLoginView.html#/s:FC4Memo11PNL.name: signUpHereButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/PNLoginView.html#/s:FC4Memo11PNL.abstract: This method is the action receiver of the touch inside the sign up here button.

Classes/PNLoginView.html#/s:FC4Memo11PNL.name: prepareForReuse()
Classes/PNLoginView.html#/s:FC4Memo11PNL.abstract: This method is responsible for resetting the view’s input values, for the purpose of reusing.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:vC.name: baseView
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:vC.abstract: This instance property is the superview of the current controller.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:vC.name: loginInteractor
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:vC.abstract: This instance property holds the login interactor that serves as an event handler.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method overrides the superclass’ implementation of viewDidLoad() to set the baseView and setting the baseView delegate.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: initializeInteractors()
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method is responsible for initializing interactors such as the PNLoginInteractor.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method overrides the superclass’ implementation of viewWillAppear() set the navigation bar’s visibility and resetting the baseView to reusing

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: validEmailFormat(string:)
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method that returns a boolean value for checking a string valid email format.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: showRegistration()
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method calls a perform segue to the Registration page.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: loginButtonTapped()
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method is the protocol implementation of a delegate method that is called whenever the login button is tapped. This is responsible for checking the validity of the user input to the login form. If valid, this creates an instance to a chain of operations for login. Otherwise, this method outputs error messages to the respective views.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: signUpHereButtonTapped()
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method is a protocol implementation of the delegate method that is called whenever the user taps the sign up button.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.name: showNotesFeed()
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html#/s:FC.abstract: This method directs this view controller to the event’s feed page.

Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.name: delegate
Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.abstract: This is a weak reference to the delegate for PNRegistrationViewDelegate.

Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.name: emailTextField
Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.abstract: This is the text field where the user inputs the email to be registered.

Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.name: passwordTextField
Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.abstract: This is the text field where the user inputs the password for the email to be registered.

Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.name: emailErrorLabel
Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.abstract: This is the container where email-related error is presented.

Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.name: passwordErrorLabel
Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:vC4Me.abstract: This is the container where password-related error is shown.

Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:FC4Me.name: signUpButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/PNRegistrationView.html#/s:FC4Me.abstract: This method where the receives the touch from the sign up button. This calls the delegate’s signUpButtonTapped

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: baseView
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: This is the main view of the registration page.

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: registrationEventHandler
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: This is the event handler for the Registration module.

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: This method overrides viewDidLoad() to initialize the baseView and set the navigation bar visibility.

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: initializeInteractors()
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: This methods initializes logic interactors for this class

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: signUpButtonTapped()
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: This method acts when the sign up button is tapped. This checks the validity of the user input in the forms. If valid, performs the chain of operation for the login operations. If invalid, shows the necessary error messages.

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: validEmailFormat(string:)
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: This method checks if an input string is in the form of a valid email address.

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: showNotesFeed()
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: This is an implementation method of a protocol method for PNShowNotesFeedProtocol. This directs the current view controller to the notes feed screen.

Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.name: PNRegistrationViewController
Classes/PNRegistrationViewController.htm.abstract: The view controller class responsible for the Registration module.

Classes/PNRegistrationView.html.name: PNRegistrationView
Classes/PNRegistrationView.html.abstract: This class represents the Registration User Interface backbone.

Classes/PNLoginViewController.html.name: PNLoginViewController
Classes/PNLoginViewController.html.abstract: This class is the view controller for the Login module.

Classes/PNLoginView.html.name: PNLoginView
Classes/PNLoginView.html.abstract: This class is the custom class for PNLoginView.xib. It references the outlets for that nib file.

Classes/PNLoginUserOperation.html.name: PNLoginUserOperation
Classes/PNLoginUserOperation.html.abstract: The operation responsible for the Login and Registration business logic of the App.

Classes/PNLogoutUserOperation.html.name: PNLogoutUserOperation
Classes/PNLogoutUserOperation.html.abstract: The operation responsible for the Logout feature of the App.

Classes/PNNetworkAvailabilityOperation.h.name: PNNetworkAvailabilityOperation
Classes/PNNetworkAvailabilityOperation.h.abstract: This operation checks for the availability of the connection to a network
